General.Name: Yunnan Jinggu Forestry Co Ltd
General.Description: Yunnan Jinggu Forestry Co.,Ltd engages in forest chemical product processing and wood-based panel manufacturing activities in China and internationally. It offers plywood, blockboard, veneer and laminated wood under the Space brand. The company is also involved in the wood mining and transportation, forestry, agricultural technology research and development, etc.; and afforestation business. Yunnan Jinggu Forestry Co.,Ltd was founded in 1999 and is based in Pu'er, China.
